Starting at the small ring crossroad Arts-Loi in the City of [MASK], the road is first named Rue de la Loi (direction Brussels centrum) or Rue Belliard (direction Aachen), then enters the Belliard tunnel under the Cinquantenaire park before it becomes the Avenue de Tervueren/Tervurenlaan past the Tervuren gate in Etterbeek.

Starting at the small ring crossroad Arts-Loi in the City of Brussels, the road is first named Rue de la Loi (direction [MASK] centrum) or Rue Belliard (direction Aachen), then enters the Belliard tunnel under the Cinquantenaire park before it becomes the Avenue de Tervueren/Tervurenlaan past the Tervuren gate in Etterbeek.
The route also crosses the municipalities of Saint-Gilles, Ixelles, the City of [MASK] and Etterbeek.
The line crosses the municipalities of Molenbeek-Saint-Jean, Koekelberg, City of [MASK], Etterbeek, Woluwe-Saint-Pierre and Woluwe-Saint-Lambert.
Starting from Herrmann-Debroux, the line crosses the municipalities of Auderghem, Etterbeek, City of [MASK], Molenbeek-Saint-Jean, Koekelberg and Anderlecht.
The Chaussée de Wavre (French) or Waversesteenweg (Dutch) in [MASK], Belgium is a major street crossing the municipalities of Ixelles, Etterbeek and Auderghem.
Yvan Mayeur (born 24 January 1960 in Etterbeek) is a Belgian politician, member of the Socialist Party and mayor of [MASK] since 2013.
The Maelbeek or Maalbeek is a stream that runs through several municipalities in [MASK], including Etterbeek, Ixelles, St-Josse-ten-Noode, Schaerbeek.
